titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Dr. Robert Hering Dreher, was a Pennsylvania physician. He received his M.D. from the University of Maryland School of Medicine in 1935. In that same year, he opened a practice in Wind Gap and continued to practice until his death in 2000.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of office records of Dr. Robert H. Dreher. Materials include appointment books, billing ledgers, narcotics registers, birth memoranda; brochures on medical supplies; patient medical files, and correspondence with other physicians related to consultations about patients. The collection also includes newspaper clippings on Dreher, several office hours signs, and a copy of Dreher's medical license from 1998.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
